name: Blog posts from Polars
description: Official blogs posts from Polars.

name: Keynote on Polars at EuroSciPy 2023
description: Talk by @ritchie46 that dives into Polars and sees what makes it so efficient.  It will touch on technologies like Arrow, Rust, parallelism, data structures, query optimization and more.

name: polars for Python
description: Python polars package to use polars DataFrame from Python.

name: Working with Polars and XlsxWriter
description: Guide to using the Python XlsxWriter library with Polars to create Excel reports.

name: Python package seaborn_polars
description: Python package to plot Polars DataFrames and LazyFrames with seaborn by @pavelcherepan.

name: Python package functime
description: Machine learning Python package built on Polars for time-series predictions by @DescendantAI . According to the developpers, it's the world's fastest and most feature-full machine learning forecasting library !

name: polars for Rust
description: Rust polars crate to use polars DataFrame with Rust.

name: rpolars for R
description: R rpolars package to use polars DataFrame from R.

name: nodejs-polars for Node.js
description: Node.js nodejs-polars package to use polars DataFrame from Node.js.

name: scala-polars for Scala and Java
description: Scala - Java scala-polars is a library for using Polars in Scala and Java projects by @chitralverma.

name: polars for Ruby
description: Ruby polars-df gems to use Polars with Ruby.

name: Polars Cheat Sheet
description: A Polars Cheat Sheet by @FranzDiebold.

name: Modern Polars
description: A side by side comparison between Polars and Pandas containing code in both frameworks by @kevinheavey.

name: Polars: um simples mas prático tutorial
description: Tutorial in the format of an ipynb notebook that illustrates several features of Polars in Portuguese by @barbosarafael. Associated github repository is here.

name: A Practical Comparison of Polars and Pandas
description: A tutorial that showcases several common operations in Pandas and Polars side by side to demonstrate how much easier Polars is by @FlorianWilhelm. There is also an accompanying Jupyter notebook available.

name: Prise en main de Polars
description: A notebook tutorial in French that illustrates the main features of Polars by @romaintailhurat and @linogaliana. There is also an accompanying blog post .

name: Running Polars code distributedly
description: A page that explains how to rung Polars code distributedly with Fugue by @fugue-project.

name: Converting SQL Queries to Polars DataFrames with JupySQL
description: A tutorial that explains how to convert SQL queries to Polars DataFrames using JupySQL by @ploomber.

name: How to display Polars dataframes with itables
description: A tutorial that explains how to display Polars dataframes with itables by @mwouts.

name: Rust Polars: Unlocking High-Performance Data Analysis — Part 1
description: First part of an article that explores the world of Rust’s Polars and explain some basic concepts of Polars such as Series by @wiseaidev. Code used is available on Github here.

name: Fast String Processing with Polars — Scam Emails Dataset
description: A tutorial using Polars to  implement a text processing pipeline process by @AntonsRuberts. Code used is available on Github here.

name: Cookbook Polars for R
description: A side-by-side comparison of Polars, R base, dplyr and data.table packages by @ddotta.

name: Polars Workshop on AWS
description: A comprehensive workshop comparing Polars to Pandas, exploring a wide range of functions and features by @debnsuma.

name: Polars cookbook in Python
description: This cookbook is a fork of the popular pandas-cookbook and has been modified to use the polars library. By @escobar-west, it uses real-world examples with "all the bugs and weirdness that entails."

name: Data Pipelines with Polars: Step-by-Step Guide
description: A tutorial that explains how to build data pipelines with Polars by @AntonsRuberts. Code used is available on Github here.

name: Python Polars: A Lightning-Fast DataFrame Library
description: A tutorial that shows how to use Polars with Python ecosystem by @hfhoffman1144. Code used is available on Github here.

name: Using the Polars DataFrame Library
description: A blog post by Wei-Meng Lee to discover the basics of Polars and how it can be used in place of Pandas.

name: Why Polars uses less memory than Pandas
description: A blog post by Itamar Turner-Trauring detailing some techniques to opptimize Pandas memory usage and see how Polars can provide an answer in some cases.

name: Plodding with Polars in Python
description: A blog post by @amitrathore that introduces some basic features of Polars.

name: Polars-lazy
description: A blog post by @ritchie46 and @jorgecarleitao that introduces Polars' lazy API in Rust.

name: Series of posts on Polars
description: A series of blogpost on Polars usage with a lot of useful tricks and information by @braaannigan. Moreover, Liam also has a Data Analysis with Polars course on Udemy.

name: Youtube videos about Polars
description: A series of short youtube videos about Polars by @braaannigan

name: Alternatives to Pandas: Python Polars
description: An article that explores the Python Polars module as an alternative to Pandas, comparing their similarities and differences and providing some examples by @JohnLockwood

name: Pandas vs Polars - A comparison on File I/O
description: A comparison on File I/O - A blog post that evaluates Polars and Pandas in terms of I/O performance and speed when handling large datasets by Wes Poulsen.

name: Discover the Power of Polars Library for Fast and Efficient Data Manipulation in Python
description: An article that quickly compares Polars to other data manipulation libraries by Morpheus.

name: Why is Polars All The Rage?
description: An article that explains why Polars will become very popular by SeattleDataGuy and Daniel Beach.

name: Polars vs Pandas — 4 key concept differences
description: An article that helps to understand key differences between Pandas and Polars Data Science libraries by @DataScienceDisciple.

name: Replacing Pandas with Polars. A Practical Guide
description: A blog post comparing some common functions between Pandas and Polars by @danielbeach. Code used is available on Github here.

name: Dataframe Showdown – Polars vs Spark vs Pandas vs DataFusion. Guess who wins?
description: A short article that presents a performance test between Polars, Pandas, Datafusion and Spark on a csv dataset by @danielbeach. Code used is available on Github here.

name: 7 Easy Steps To Switch From Pandas to Lightning Fast Polars And Never Return
description: A cheat sheet blog post of the most common Pandas operations translated into Polars by @BexTuychiev.

name: Polars for initial data analysis, Polars for production
description: A blog post that shows how to use Polars for initial data analysis and then effectively in production by @itamarst.

name: DuckDB vs Polars vs Spark!
description: An article that performs a benchmark against duckdb/Polars/spark, with varying row count, with swap usage as another metric, in addition to runtime in seconds. Code used is available on Github here.

name: Benchmarking PySpark Pandas, Pandas UDFs, and Fugue Polars
description: A blog post that compares the execution time of fugue + Polars, Pandas UDFs and PySpark Pandas by @kvnkho.

name: Pandas vs. Polars: The Battle of Performance
description: An another blog post that compares the performance between Pandas and Polars across a range of common data manipulation tasks by @makeuseofcode. Code used is available on Github.

name: Pandas 2.0 vs Polars: The Ultimate Battle
description: A blog post that analyzes in terms of Syntax, Speed, and Usability between Pandas 2.0 and Polars 0.17.0 by @priyanshu7401.

name: Polars - modern data frame library
description: modern data frame library  - A blog post that describes why Polars could be a better alternative to pandas, dplyr or data.table by @DSkrzypiec.

name: The fastest way to read a CSV file in Python
description: A blog post that compares different ways (including Polars, pyarrow and C) to read a CSV file with Python by Finn Andersen.

name: Pandas vs Polars vs Pandas 2.0 …. FIGHT
description: A blog post that does an ETL process for checking big data speed processing between Pandas, Pandas 2.0 and Polars by @guoliveira.

name: Pandas vs Polars vs Pandas 2.0 … ROUND 2
description: A blog post that makes a new comparison between Pandas, Pandas 2.0 and Polars by @guoliveira.

name: Polars VS PySpark: Lazy Evaluation and Big Data
description: A blog post that compares lazy evaluation between Polars and Spark by @guoliveira.

name: Polars in the aRtic!
description: An another blog post that compares the performance between Pandas and Polars across a range of common data manipulation tasks by @MCodrescu. Code used is available on Github.

name: A Polars exploration into Kedro
description: A blog post that explains how Polars can be used instead of pandas in Kedro  for your data catalog and data manipulation by @astrojuanlu.

name: High Performance Data Manipulation in Python: pandas 2.0 vs. polars
description: A blog post that compares differences between Python pandas 2.0 and Polars libraries by @jcanalesluna.

name: Lightning-fast queries with Polars
description: Another blog post that is a good introduction to Polars by @astrojuanlu.

name: Polars – Laziness and SQL Context.
description: A blog post that presents two good reasons to adopt Polars :  Lazy and SQL Context by @danielbeach.

name: Exploring Polars - The Lightning-Fast DataFrame Library in Python
description: The Lightning-Fast DataFrame Library in Python  - A blog post on the basics of Polars by @mddas.

name: Pandas vs Polars – Speed Comparison
description: A blog post that compares the performance of Polars, Pandas and Pandas 2.0 by @StuffbyYuki. Code used is available on Github here.

name: LazyFrame vs DataFrame in Polars – Performance Comparison
description: A blog post that introduces what LazyFrame is in Polars and its performance gain compared to DataFrame by @StuffbyYuki. Code used is available on Github here.

name: Querying Polars DataFrames using SQL
description: A blog post that shows how to use the SQLContext object in Python to query a Polars DataFrame directly using SQL by @weimenglee.

name: Polars vs Pandas: A Brief Tale of Two DataFrame Libraries
description: A blog post that compares Polars and Pandas focusing in particular on optional dependencies by @ranggakd.

name: EDA with Polars: Step-by-Step Guide for Pandas Users (Part 1)
description: A blog post that describes the main data processing operations with Polars in Python by @AntonsRuberts. Code used is available in this notebook.

name: EDA with Polars: Step-by-Step Guide to Aggregate and Analytic Functions (Part 2)
description: A blog post that shows how to perform with Polars and Python some fairly complex aggregates, rolling statistics and more by @AntonsRuberts. Code used is available in this notebook.

name: Pyspark or Polars — What should you use?
description: A blog post that explores and breaks down some of the similarities between PySpark and Polars. It provides insights on when to choose one over the other by Vivek Kovvuru.

name: Getting Started with the Polars Data Manipulation Library
description: A blog post that presents some simple features of Polars using Python by Juveriya Mahreen.

name: 8 ways pandas really losing to Polars for quick market data analysis
description: A newsletter that compares the performance of Polars to Pandas for many common data manipulation techniques by PyQuant News.

name: All that Polars that Make You Forget Pandas
description: A blog post that explores some deeper reasons behind the performance gains of Polars over Pandas.

name: Polars vs Pandas. Inside an AWS Lambda
description: A blog post that covers the topic of using Polars vs Pandas inside an AWS Lambda to do data processing by @danielbeach. Code used is available on Github here.

name: DuckDB vs Polars for Data Engineering
description: A blog post that compares Polars and DuckDB with pipelines for Data Engineering by @danielbeach.

name: Pandas vs Polars: A database speed test. Who wins?
description: A blog post that compares the run-time of reading a database into a dataframe using Pandas versus using Polars by Thomas Reid.

name: Polars and Pandas : What's the difference ?
description: A blog post that explains how Polars works under the hood and th best use cases for Polars and Pandas by @t-redactyl.

name: Understanding the Polars nested column types
description: A blog post that helps to understand how nested column types works in Polars by @braaannigan.

name: Polars: Blazingly Fast DataFrames in Rust and Python
description: Introduction to Polars by databricks.

name: Polars: The Next Big Python Data Science Library... written in Rust?
description: A short video tutorial to get started coding with Polars by @RobMulla.

name: The Last Polars Dataframe vs. Pandas Dataframe Video You Should Ever See
description: A video that compares Polars and Pandas data frames.

name: The Best library for building Data Pipelines...
description: A video that compares Pandas, Spark and Polars for working with data in Python by @RobMulla.

name: Expressive & fast dataframes in Python with polars
description: A video that reviews some alternatives to Pandas for Python and then demonstrates some Polars features by Juan Luis Cano Rodríguez.

name: Polars Introduction for Python with a 128GB Ryzen 24-core Benchmark vs Pandas
description: A video that provides an introduction to Polars for Python by @jeffheaton. Notebook used for the video in this github repo.

name: Polars: The main alternative to pandas in Python!?
description: A Polars tutorial series on Youtube by @martinbel. Notebooks and datasets used for the videos available in this github repo.

name: Polars vs Pandas
description: A detailed video on Youtube that compares Polars and Pandas by @hu-po.

name: Polars: The Super Fast Dataframe Library for Python — Goodbye Pandas?
description: An article and a video ⏳ 19 min that explores some basic features of Polars by @ifrankandrade

name: Manipulación de Datos con Polars en python
description: A detailed tutorial video in Spanish that shows 20 Polars functions to perform 80% of the tasks of a data scientist by Naren Castellon.

name: An opinionated introduction to Polars
description: Great Polars introduction slides from @krlng at PyCon 2023.

name: Polars - make the switch to lightning-fast dataframes
description: make the switch to lightning-fast dataframes ⏳ 30 min - A talk that reports an experience switching from Pandas to Polars in a real-world ML project by @datenzauberai. Slides are available here.

name: Polars vs Pandas | detailed test with explained results
description: A video that presents 8 distinct tests which demonstrates differences between Pandas and Polars by @vb100. Associated github repo is here.

name: Polars: A highly optimized dataframe library
description: A video that presents some mains features of Polars by @mattharrison.

name: How to update mass data using Polars DataFrame
description: A video that presents the process of writing code to update mass columns across CSV or data files by @AmitXShukla. Notebook used for the video in this github repo.

name: Using the Rust Polars DataFrame library in a CLI
description: A video that shows how to integrate Polars in a commande line interface by @paiml.

name: The Ultimate Guide to Data Wrangling with Python | Rust Polars Data Frame
description: A playlist of 10 videos (WIP) that equips you with all the necessary knowledge required to utilize Python Polars Data Frame by @AmitXShukla.
